MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://pad.asp-software.org

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Linux,Mac OS X,Win2000,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,WinOther,WinServer,WinVista,WinVista x64,WinXP,Other
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: This is a major release. Several user interface improvements and bug fixes (see the User Manual for more information).
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: .NET or Mono, Windows Vista or later, Linux, Mac OS X

English.Keywords: checksum, hash, file verification, fteeware, cryptographic hash function, MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512, GUI application, Windows, Linux, utility, user friendly
English.Char_Desc_45: GUI tool for calculation of file checksums.
English.Char_Desc_80: User friendly application for calculation of file and text checksums.
English.Char_Desc_250: User friendly application for calculation of file checksums (cryptographic hash functions). Intuitive GUI with drag & drop, possibility to save checksums to a file, calculation of MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256 and SHA-512 checksums, verification of checksums.
English.Char_Desc_450: HashForm is a handy tool for calculation and verification of file checksums (cryptographic hash functions). Due to its intuitive user interface design for efficiency, software is suitable for verification of checksums of files downloaded from the Internet, and also for software producers. Further info: http://www2.arnes.si/~ljc3m2/igor/software/IGLibShellApp/HashForm.html#hashform
English.Char_Desc_2000:
HashForm is a handy tool for calculation and verification of file checksums (cryptographic hash functions). Due to its intuitive user interface design for efficiency, software is suitable for verification of checksums of files downloaded from the Internet, and also for software producers in order to calculate and publish checksums of their downloadable files. Functionality: • Calculation and verification of standard checksums (hash values): o MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA512 o User can select which checksums are calculated o Possibility of saving calculated checksums to a file • Calculation of checksums (hash values) of arbitrary files o Specify the file by browsing or drag & drop a file from a file manager or by specifying file path o Directory of last selected file is remembered o Immediate calculation of checksums after selection of a file • Calculation of checksum of arbitrary text o Text can be typed in by user o Text can be dragged & dropped from a text editor, office application, browser, or any other application that supports selection and drag & drop of text • Easy to use user interface, optimized to speed up work and reduce possibility of mistakes o Help file – user manual o Responsive user interface in case of large files o Possibility to cancel calculation of checksums o Automatic calculation of checksums when possible, no need to click a button:  After drag & drop of file or text  After selection of a new file • Cross-platform, runs on Windows, Lunux or Mac. On non-Windows systems, the Mono framework must be installed in order to run HashForm. The same executable is run on different platforms.
Further info: http://www2.arnes.si/~ljc3m2/igor/software/IGLibShellApp/HashForm.html#hashform http://www2.arnes.si/~ljc3m2/igor/software/IGLibShellApp/doc/HashForm_help.html http://www2.arnes.si/~ljc3m2/igor/iglib/
